title: Handwritten Yardbird logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_3781.png)

I assume the logo above would be custom hand lettering but if anyone knows of any typefaces that are similar, would be much much appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_65.png) | 23.69 KB |
author: mr_ampersand

comments.content:
Very few options that even come near to the quality of hand-drawn type, but these might get you closer:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/pastiche-brush/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/pastiche-brush/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/pastiche-brush/")  
 [http://haroldsfonts.com/portfolio/imitation/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730/http:/haroldsfonts.com/portfolio/imitation/ "http://haroldsfonts.com/portfolio/imitation/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/andinistas/chefscript/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/andinistas/chefscript/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/andinistas/chefscript/")  
 [http://www.fonts.com/font/typodermic/enamel-brush/regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730/http:/www.fonts.com/font/typodermic/enamel-brush/regular "http://www.fonts.com/font/typodermic/enamel-brush/regular")

And there is always the old standby:

[http://www.myfonts.com/search/mistral/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/mistral/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/mistral/fonts/")

A couple of upright scripts from Filmotype with similar character strokes: Filmotype Havana [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/havana/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/havana/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/havana/") and Filmotype Horizon [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/horizon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/horizon/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/horizon/")  
Also Brophy Script [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/brophy-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/brophy-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/brophy-script/") Brody [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/brody/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/brody/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/brody/") [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/brody/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/brody/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/brody/")  
Don

I think this is by Evan Hecox. [http://handletteringtutorial.com/evan-hecox-brush-lettering/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215120730/http:/handletteringtutorial.com/evan-hecox-brush-lettering/ "http://handletteringtutorial.com/evan-hecox-brush-lettering/")
